content.title: Intro
content.content:
1991
Preceded by
1991
1992
Year
1993
Followed by
1993

Tolkien-related events that took place in 1992. Because this year marked the 100th birthday of J.R.R. Tolkien, it is often referred to as the Centenary year or Centennial Year.

content.title: January
content.content:
3 - Hundredth birthday of J.R.R. Tolkien.
3 - On this special day, the Finnish Tolkien Society is founded.
3 - The premiere of the first episode of German radio serial adaptation Der Herr der Ringe, a co-production of public radio broadcasters SWR (Südwestrundfunk) and WDR (Westdeutscher Rundfunk), on Tolkien's 100th birthday.
6 - Sauron Defeated is published in the UK.
6 - The Tolkien Family Album is published.
11-12 - On the occasion of the centenary, an International Tolkien Symposium is held in Aachen, Germany.
? - Vinyar Tengwar 21 is published.
? - Beyond Bree J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar 1992 is released.
? - Amon Hen 113 is published.

content.title: April
content.content:
29 - Stephen Oliver dies.
? - Conclusion of the German radio serial adaptation Der Herr der Ringe.

content.title: May
content.content:
22-24 - The Tolkien Phenomenon is held.
? - Vinyar Tengwar 23 is published.

content.title: August
content.content:
16 - The first part of the radio adaptation of Farmer Giles of Ham is aired on BBC 5.
16-24 - Tolkien Centenary Conference, a combination of Oxonmoot and Mythcon.
23 - The second part of the radio adaptation of Farmer Giles of Ham is aired on BBC5.
30 - The radio adaptation of Smith of Wootton Major is aired on BBC 5.
? - The Making of The Lord of the Rings by Rayner Unwin is published.
? - Mallorn 29 is published.

content.title: September
content.content:
6 - The first part of the radio adaptation of The Adventures of Tom Bombadil is aired on BBC5.
13 - The second part of the radio adaptation of The Adventures of Tom Bombadil is aired on BBC5.
20 - The radio adaptation of Leaf by Niggle is aired on BBC5.
22 - The Danish Tolkien Society Tolkiens Følge is founded.
? - Vinyar Tengwar 25 is published.

content.title: October
content.content:
27 - Sauron Defeated is published in the US.
27 - Pictures by J.R.R. Tolkien (revised edition) is published.

content.title: November
content.content:
6 - Robert Aramayo is born.
? - Vinyar Tengwar 26 is published.

? - Tolkien and Middle-earth Handbook by Colin Duriez is published.
? - The Bulgarian magazine Duga ceases to exist, cutting short their comic book version of The Lord of the Rings at the Breaking of the Fellowship.
? - An abridged reading of The Lord of the Rings by J.R.R. Tolkien is published by Caedmon.
? - Tolkien's World: Paintings of Middle-earth is published.
? - Tolkien: The Illustrated Encyclopedia by David Day is published.
? - The documentary Tolkien Remembered is aired.
? - The First and Second Ages is published.
? - Basic Quenya is published.
? - The Tolkien Calendar 1993 is released.
? - The 1993 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar released.
? - Eric Thompson notices small differences between the first and second impressions of The Fellowship of the Ring and informs the publishers; Rayner Unwin discovers that the printer had quietly reset the volume types 38 years earlier.
Years
1989 1990 1991 1992 1993 1994 1995
